channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Share Buttons Adder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Share Buttons Adder

item.title: CVE-2024-4094|2024-06-18T06:00:02.301Z -- unknown -- simple%20share%20buttons%20adder
item.description: The Simple Share Buttons Adder WordPress plugin before 8.5.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as editors to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
